_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Java
author: shadow.xox78@gmail.com
startup: if [[ ! -z {{STARTUP_SCRIPT}} ]]; then mvn clean install; fi; if [[ -f /home/container/{{STARTUP_SCRIPT}} && ({{STARTUP_SCRIPT}} == *.jar) ]]; then java -jar /home/container/{{STARTUP_SCRIPT}}; else echo 'Invalid file type or file not found'; fi;

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Java App Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
apt update
apt install -y curl jq file unzip maven openjdk-11-jdk

echo -e "updating maven. please wait..."
mvn clean install

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

echo "Installing java dependencies"
if [[ ! -z ${JAVA_DEPENDENCIES} ]]; then
    mvn install ${JAVA_DEPENDENCIES}
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/pom.xml ]; then
    mvn install --production
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0

variables.name: Startup Script
variables.description: The path to the startup script (.jar file)

variables.name: Additional Java dependencies
variables.description:
Install additional Java dependencies.

Use spaces to separate.
